attributes.action: Stop Sadiq khans call for second referendum if labour win next election.
attributes.background:
A vote was won get out the EU 
Stop the likes of Sadiq khan and Labour MPs 
Promising a second referendum in the next election, It's the right of us English/British citizen of the UK to demonstrate our democratic vote and it should not be undermined the voice of the people has to be upheld

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the views of the Mayor of London or other politicians.
